apis.name: search_listings
apis.description: Search for listings on Airbnb based on location, dates, and other parameters

query_params.location: required string: The location to search for listings
query_params.checkin: required string: Check-in date in YYYY-MM-DD format
query_params.checkout: required string: Check-out date in YYYY-MM-DD format
query_params.page: optional integer: Page number for pagination
